name: aya-defi-navigator
description: AI-Powered DeFi Onboarding & Risk Management Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:mcp && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mcp" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:manual: echo 'Run these in 3 separate terminals:' && echo '1. cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000' && echo '2. cd mcp-server && npm run dev' && echo '3. cd frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mcp
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:mcp && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:mcp && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && flake8 app/ && black --check app/
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000 && curl -f http://localhost:8000/health && curl -f http://localhost:3001

author: Aya Team
